name: Tight Studio
tagline: An AI-native, more powerful Screen Studio
description: Tight Studio has everything you need to make an impressive product demo: automatic zoom in, powerful caption editing and built-in caption styles, crystal clear AI voiceover, music library, text overlay and animation, import media or generate media with AI.

name: ElevenLabs UI
tagline: Open-source components for AI audio & voice agents
description: ElevenLabs UI is an open-source component library built on shadcn/ui to help you build AI audio and voice agent experiences faster. It provides pre-built, customizable components for voice chat, transcription, and more, all under an MIT license.

name: Plural
tagline: Your AI-powered control plane for Kubernetes
description: Plural brings AI to DevOps. It unifies your Kubernetes clusters behind a single pane of glass, automates upgrades, diagnoses & remediates issues, and gives teams the leverage to run infrastructure without scaling complexity.

name: Glue
tagline: Agentic, MCP-powered team chat turns talk into action
description: Glue is the first platform for agentic team chat, where humans, their tools, and AI collaborate side by side. With native AI, goal-oriented threads, and MCP-powered workflows, teams can cut noise and turn conversations into outcomes.

name: Agent Runners
tagline: Build and ship with Claude Code, Codex, Gemini in Netlify
description: Agent Runners let you ship AI-generated code right from the Netlify Dashboard. Use agents like Claude Code, Codex, or Gemini without setup. Speed up troubleshooting, clear backlogs, and let your whole team contribute with real production context.

name: Stencil by SUPERHANDS
tagline: Copy any webpage component straight into Lovable Bolt or V0
description: Bridge the gap between the web and your prototypes. Copy UI from any webpage and paste it into Lovable, v0, or Bolt to prototype instantly.

name: One Line
tagline: Draw it in one continuous line!
description: Players are challenged to draw words using a single continuous line without lifting their finger or mouse, then share their creations with the community for others to guess.

name: Nyra AI
tagline: The AI Growth Stack for Founders
description: An AI-powered growth stack that helps you ideate, design, launch, and optimize ads across Google, Meta, and TikTok. Get real-time insights and automated optimization for your campaigns.

name: Tasklet
tagline: Automate your business with AI agents
description: Tasklet makes it easy to automate any business process with AI — just describe what you want in plain English. Tasklet connects with any API or MCP server and can control a computer in the cloud. If your business uses it, it can automate it.

name: Launchie
tagline: The launchpad replacement for MacOS 26 to find all your apps
description: Launchie brings back the power of Launchpad with drag & drop reordering, custom folders, and customizable hotkeys for macOS 26 Tahoe. Free download for Apple Silicon Macs.

name: Spottr
tagline: Ctrl+F for videos
description: Ctrl+F for Videos - Search and find anything in your videos instantly

name: TuneTrain.ai
tagline: Fine-tune AI models with your augmented data
description: TuneTrain.ai - Fine-tune AI models with your data TuneTrain.ai lets anyone fine-tune small language models easily - no coding or huge datasets needed. Create example records, augment them into large datasets, and train your own custom AI.

name: Whistl
tagline: Like parental control but with friends
description: Break bad habits — together. Whistl pairs you with a mate who keeps you accountable and cheers you on. No more going it alone — real support, real results. Mates don’t let mates fall back. Join now at www.whistl.app.

name: NuggetFinder
tagline: Claim Validated Startup Ideas: Timing + Demand + Tech
description: We aggregate 1200 market signals + real-time data feeds and run 120 validation checks to find validated startup opportunities with perfect timing: market signals, competitive gaps, demand validation, technical feasibility, a real wedge + a full execution plan.

name: Heroku Vibes
tagline: Your Collaborative Agent For Turning Ideas to Apps
description: Create with Vibes and deploy to Heroku, the platform trusted by builders of over 65 million apps, serving over 65 billion requests per day.

name: Brand Bird
tagline: On-demand brand identity design
description: Agencies are changing! Get white labelled unlimited brand identity design on a monthly flat fee. No more unreliable freelancers and contractors. Get designs in just 2 business days.

name: Pocket Squats
tagline: Most fitness apps guess. Pocket Squats learns
description: Most fitness apps guess. Pocket Squats learns. Your AI personal trainer that adapts every workout to your body, recovery, and schedule, helping you train smarter, stay consistent, and build confidence through truly personalised training.

name: Magic Studio
tagline: Ideas to art, in seconds. World's easiest AI art generator.
description: Create beautiful, fun art from text, in seconds. Describe what you want to see, pick a style and customize as you like. Try different variations, till you like one. Ideal for moodboards, concepts, covers, posters, socials. Free to use, no signup needed.

name: Yousteady 0.1v
tagline: Your AI guide to future skills
description: Learning shouldn’t feel chaotic. In a world of endless information, Steady makes learning simple, structured, and stress-free.

name: Brainerr
tagline: Let's Cut Screen Time This Week
description: Replace your devices with 5,000+ weekly updated printable activities. Brain-boosting fun for kids, teens, and adults to enjoy together.
